transArray.content: The location is good and the transportation is very convenient. Although the furnishings in the room are not very new, they are also very clean. The service attitude of the staff is very good. I bought breakfast for 48 yuan. The variety is good. There is no problem with eating. Overall it is okay.

Hello dear guests! Thank you for staying at Orange Beijing Wukesong Hotel. Your satisfaction is our greatest encouragement and support. The welcome gifts carefully prepared by the hotel for you carry our most sincere greetings and expectations for you. We are committed to providing every guest with meticulous, thoughtful, warm and considerate services. Thank you very much for your review and support. Breakfast at the hotel The time is from 7:00 to 11:00. The Chinese and Western buffet breakfast has a variety of varieties, is nutritious and delicious. We strive to make every guest happy to become a repeat customer. The hotel is located at Gate 2 East of Badili Automobile Park. Take Metro Line 6 and exit from Haidian Wuluju Station. It takes 3-5 minutes to walk directly to the hotel. We look forward to seeing you again. I wish you a happy life. General Manager: Zhang Xiangyun
